Feature.Name: Mithral Armor
Feature.Text: Mithral is a light, flexible metal. A mithral chain shirt or breastplate can be worn under normal clothes. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks or has a Strength requirement, the mithral version of the armor doesn't.

MagicProperty.Requirement: Armor (medium or heavy, but not hide)
